_comments.setup: 1. Copy this file to .bctb-config.json in your workspace directory
_comments.tenantId: Your Azure AD tenant ID - find in Azure Portal > Azure Active Directory > Properties
_comments.applicationInsightsAppId: Find in Azure Portal > Application Insights > API Access > Application ID
_comments.kustoClusterUrl: Replace YOUR-SUBSCRIPTION-ID with your Azure subscription ID
_comments.workspacePath: Use ${workspaceFolder} or absolute path to your workspace directory
_comments.security: IMPORTANT: Add .bctb-config.json to .gitignore - it contains credentials!
